title: The Expenditure Approach to Calculating GDP

content.question:

Values (in billions of dollars) 

Consumption Spending 
13

12

3

Net Exports

Calculate Country X’s nominal gross domestic product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>GDP</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for 2017 using the expenditures approach.
